microsoft /

      wslg---Enabling the Windows Subsystem for Linux to include support for Wayland and X server related scenarios

chrisleekr /

      binance-trading-bot---Automated Binance trading bot - Buy low/Sell high with stop loss limit/Trade multiple cryptocurrencies

photoprism /

      photoprism---Personal Photo Management powered by Go and Google TensorFlow

donnemartin /

      system-design-primer---Learn how to design large-scale systems. Prep for the system design interview. Includes Anki flashcards.

jackfrued /

      Python-100-Days---Python - 100天从新手到大师

chefyuan /

      algorithm-base---专门为刚开始刷题的同学准备的算法基地，没有最细只有更细，立志用动画将晦涩难懂的算法说的通俗易懂！

TheAlgorithms /

      Python---All Algorithms implemented in Python

ornicar /

      lila---♞ lichess.org: the forever free, adless and open source chess server ♞

kamranahmedse /

      developer-roadmap---Roadmap to becoming a web developer in 2021

v2fly /

      v2ray-core---A platform for building proxies to bypass network restrictions.

public-apis /

      public-apis---A collective list of free APIs

danistefanovic /

      build-your-own-x---🤓 Build your own (insert technology here)

josepholiveira /

      podcastr---A platform built for podcast broadcasting. Developed during @Rocketseat NLW#05 free training.

ml-tooling /

      opyrator---🪄 Turns your machine learning code into microservices with web API, interactive GUI, and more.

EbookFoundation /

      free-programming-books---📚 Freely available programming books

ossu /

      computer-science---🎓 Path to a free self-taught education in Computer Science!

bmorelli25 /

      Become-A-Full-Stack-Web-Developer---Free resources for learning Full Stack Web Development

mahmoud-eskandari /

      vuemastery-dl---vuemastery video downloader

sindresorhus /

      awesome---😎 Awesome lists about all kinds of interesting topics

Emadabdelhamied /

      Eng-Mohamed-Hammad-Posts---

bradtraversy /

      design-resources-for-developers---Curated list of design and UI resources from stock photos, web templates, CSS frameworks, UI libraries, tools and much more

DidierRLopes /

      GamestonkTerminal---The next best thing after Bloomberg Terminal

RH12503 /

      triangula---Generate high-quality triangulated art from images.

you-dont-need /

      You-Dont-Need-JavaScript---CSS is powerful, you can do a lot of things without JS.

aladinyo /

      WhatsappyApp---A whatsapp clone progressive web application built with react nodejs and firebase
